Hopleez

ExamineHe was here first.
Advanced data
NPC ID7481

Hopleez is a player spoof who can be found on all along the South Eastern coast of Hosidius. He wields red chinchompa, and wears a white unicorn mask, amulet of fury (or), rangers' tunic, infinity gloves, black d'hide chaps, and flippers.

His name is a play on the phrase "hop please", which means to tell a player to change worlds so that their spot in a certain training area is not taken.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 June 2021
(update)

Hopleez now roams around the various sand crab areas, no longer be consistently found on any single world.[1] In addition, he can no longer be spoken to.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Hopleez's appearance is based on Mitch Vanvaerenbergh's cosplay[2] at RuneFest 2016.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 20 June 2021. (Archived from the original on 20 June 2021.) Mod Ash: "He moves to various areas, doesn't he?"
  2. ↑ Jagex. osrsMitch's Twitter account. 19 September 2016. (Archived from the original on 31 March 2020.) osrsMitch: "Thanks to all you lovely scapers, for voting me on stage, letting me represent osrs fashionscape"
